emailHelper: We will send an order confirmation to this email.
haveAccount: You already have an account? please enter here
noPayment: No payment methods available. Please enter the address and select a shipping method first.

message.problemConnection: There was a trouble in your connection

message.purchaseOrderFailed: Purchase order number failed to set

message.customerFormValidation: Please choose a billing and shipping address, shipping method, payment method, input purchase order number, sign and agree to the terms and conditions before placing an order.
